subject: Hi,  Ma’am,
body:
Hi,  Ma’am, 
My Name is Mrs. Valentine Geroud,
 I am terminally ill and presently in an Intensive care Unit in a hospital here in Turkey Where I have been taking treatment as I battle Leukemia for more than 6 agonizing years.
I want to entrust to you my bequest at the financial Volume of US$ 5,500,000.00 for Humanitarian  purposes.
Could you please permit me to give you details of the discussion by email.
Thanking You ,
 Valentijn Geroud,

subject: Re: Hi,  Ma’am,
body:
Hello Mrs. Valentine Geroud,

I'm really sorry to hear about your situation. It must be incredibly tough for you. I hope you're getting the best care possible in Turkey.

Your message has certainly piqued my interest, although I must admit, I'm a bit confused about the details. Could you please elaborate more on this bequest and its purposes? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Please note that while I am interested in learning more, I won't be able to provide any personal information online for security reasons.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Hello Robert.,

Firstly, I must truly apologize for intruding in the first place, But I got
your contact through random  searches I made on the web.

I am also sorry for getting back to you late after your mail, it's because
of my little strength .

Like I said before, My name is  Mrs. Velvet Geroudam 75 years old, Canadian
National Living in Turkey with my husband for over 45 years . My Husband
works as an Engineer  with the Bayegan Dis Tic A.S. This is an oil and Gas
Company  in Turkey.

In the year 2013 I was diagnosed to have Breast cancer , this was not
dictated earlier because there was no sign or symptom of such disease, It
was after two weeks it was confirmed that The cancer is Stage IV
(metastatic). This is indeed a dead sentience to me and ever since then I
have been battling the diseases but the spread is massive and so nothing
can be done except  managing it and waiting for the last call home.

I inherited this amount as mentioned before $5,500.000.00 from my late
husband and because we could not have a child for our Marriage , I have
thus decided to solicit your hand in helping me ensure that this amount is
accordingly given to the Less privileged in the society  .
I therefore and again plead that you make yourself available to be used to
fulfill my last wish whether I am alive to its conclusion or not . This you
will do by receiving this money from the bank where it's deposited and use
it for humanitarian work.
I have a lawyer here who will be of assistance in making sure this is
possible.
Basically, this is how I sincerely wish the Money be shared or disbursed on
your total supervision.

(1) Give 10% of the money for general Miscellaneous and logistics, before ,
during and after the process.

(2) Give 70% of the money to Charity organizations, Orphanage homes and
Churches on my name so that my soul may rest in peace.

The remaining 20% should be for you and others that you would love to
assist.

Upon your full consideration and acceptance of this, kindly let me know so
that I can get the lawyer to begin immediately with the  legal documents
for this matter.
Regards,
Mrs.  Velvet

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Hello Mrs. Velvet,

I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a tough time for you and I appreciate your courage in dealing with it.

Your intention to help the less privileged is commendable and it's an honor that you considered me for this noble cause. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

1. How did you find my contact information? 
2. Could you please provide more details about the lawyer who will assist us?
3. What kind of legal documents are involved in this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Hello Mrs. Velvet,

I'm truly sorry to hear about your health condition. It must be a tough time for you and I appreciate your courage in dealing with it.

Your intention to help the less privileged is commendable and it's an honor that you considered me for this noble cause. However, I have a few questions before we proceed further.

1. How did you find my contact information? 
2. Could you please provide more details about the lawyer who will assist us?
3. What kind of legal documents are required for this process?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Hello Robert.,

Thank You for replying back, to respond to your questions, Firstly I got
your contact through random searches I made on the internet, I  told God to
produce who will do this work for me , that is how I got your contact
through search on Google .  However I am sure that it was a divine
arrangement.

The Lawyer is our family Lawyer, he is willing to be of assistance in
whichever way to make this successful.

The documents or procedures are to get documents  affidavit according to
the Lawyer given power to the beneficiary to receive this fund, and to
state that I willingly transferred this fund to the beneficiary for the
stated purposes.

 He said when this is done and the purpose of the transfer is well stated
in the document, it will not be a problem when the transfer will be made to
your account.

I am sure the lawyer’s part of the work will end once you receive the money.
Regards,
Mrs.  Velvet

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Hello Mrs. Velvet,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting how you found my contact through a random search on Google, isn't it? I'm curious about this divine intervention you mentioned. Could you elaborate more on that?

Also, regarding the lawyer and the documents, could you please clarify what exactly these documents are? And what does an affidavit entail in this context? 

You mentioned that the purpose of the transfer needs to be well stated in the document. What is the intended purpose of this transfer?

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Robert

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Dear Robert,

I have seen your letter,

Yes I got your contact from the internet, I have not had a personal
encounter with you before, nor have you refer to me by anybody. I would not
know what is strange about this.

What I mean by divine arrangement, is getting total stranger only by
searching on the internet by adding a few keywords could only be possible
by God.

I was well informed that to transfer this amount of funds is not easy
because of regulations, but having a solid reason for the transfer such as
Humanitarian Purposes will help to make transfer hitch free.

The documents I am talking about is paperwork which will   say that this
fund is willingly instructed by the owner to be transferred to the
beneficiary and for the purpose of charity work.

If you are not cleared with my answers, you may wish to talk further with
the lawyer so more clarity.
Regards,
Mrs.  Velvet

subject: Re: Hi, Ma’am,
body:
Dear Mrs. Velvet,

Thank you for your response. I must say, it's quite fascinating how the internet can connect total strangers in such a way. It's almost like divine intervention, as you've mentioned.

I understand that transferring funds of this magnitude is not an easy task and requires solid reasons and proper documentation. The idea of using these funds for charity work sounds noble indeed.

Could you please elaborate more on the paperwork? What kind of information would be required from my end to facilitate this process? Also, could you provide me with the contact details of the lawyer so I can discuss further?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Robert
